com.cognifide.qa.bb.provider.selenium.webdriver.modifiers.capabilities

Interface CapabilitiesModifier

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EnableProxy

    public interface CapabilitiesModifier
    Describes a modifier for Capabilities instance - it will be triggered before WebDriver creation. Modification can be controlled via shouldModify() method. Order of the execution can be controlled via getOrder() method. Each modifier must be registered in a Guice module using Multibinder.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default int getOrder()
      Optional method, used to control order of modifications - modificators will be sorted based on the value returned by this method.
      org.openqa.selenium.Capabilities modify(org.openqa.selenium.Capabilities capabilities)
      Modifies given instance of Capabilities and passes it further (potentially for additional modifications).
      boolean shouldModify()
      This method can be used to control if the modification should be triggered, e.g.

    • Method Detail

      • shouldModify

        boolean shouldModify()
        This method can be used to control if the modification should be triggered, e.g. when a property is set to some value.
        Returns:
        true if the modification should be triggered

      • modify

        org.openqa.selenium.Capabilities modify(org.openqa.selenium.Capabilities capabilities)
        Modifies given instance of Capabilities and passes it further (potentially for additional modifications).
        Parameters:
        capabilities - instance of the Capabilities that will be modified
        Returns:
        modified Capabilities instance

      • getOrder

        default int getOrder()
        Optional method, used to control order of modifications - modificators will be sorted based on the value returned by this method.
        Returns:
        order of the modification, default is set to 0
